title: Echo Flare
description: Echo Flare is a full-motion video interactive narrative set in a modern city with secrets and choices. Drawn into a urban adventure, you control the story. Navigate the city, meet diverse characters, and shape branching paths through dialogue, exploration, and quick actions.
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Echo Flare-144hv](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/14e81551525c4002ad4e6add86723fb5/echo-flare-144hv.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Guide your path through a modern city of secrets. Your choices and quick actions shape branching outcomes in Echo Flare.
<!--text-->
**Game Experience Overview**

Echo Flare is a grounded live-action interactive thriller  where your choices and reactions drive the story. As events unfold, you must navigate a web of trust, uncertainty, and shifting motives. Every conversation, decision, and interactive action with the characters you meet will carries real weight – influencing a branching narrative that can lead  to safety, unexpected revelations, or deeper entanglements.  

Your journey in Echo Flare takes you through a variety of urban locations, from bustling night streets and quiet homes to secret hideouts of the city. The atmosphere is immersive yet approachable, offering a suspenseful experience. 

Will you uncover the truth behind the events, build lasting friendships, or find yourself drawn further into the unknown? The outcome is in your hands, with even small choices in dialogue or action altering the path ahead.



**Game Features**

**Interactive Cinematic Storytelling**
Shape a multi-branching narrative through your decisions and actions in a live-action adventure. Each playthrough offers different twists and multiple endings, making every experience unique.

**Live-Action Immersion with Quick-Time Event Challenges**
Step into the story from a first-person perspective through high-quality FMV sequences performed by real actors. Stay engaged with reflex-based prompts during key scenes and guide the story forward through timely actions.

**Meaningful Choices**
Choose how you respond and react in everyday conversations and critical situations. Shape the personality throughout the progression in the city. Each choice influences how the story unfolds and how other characters react to you.

**Relationship Dynamics**
Build trust or create tension with a diverse cast of characters in Echo Flare. The relationships you nurture or damage will directly impact who stands by your side when it matters most.

**Urban Exploration**
Explore a contemporary city filled with hidden secrets and  unexpected encounters. From neon-lit streets to quiet apartments, each location holds clues that connect to the larger mystery in Echo Flare."
